name: Rise from Ashes: A Phoenix's Quest
name_original: Rise from Ashes: A Phoenix's Quest
description:
Rise from Ashes: A Phoenix's Quest is an exciting action-packed game that will have players assuming the role of a trapped phoenix, fighting to break free and rise from the ashes.

As the phoenix, players will have to navigate through a series of dangerous bioms and defeat enemies along the way. The phoenix is a powerful creature, able to use its internal fire to attack its foes. However, using this ability will drain the phoenix's fire, and if it runs out completely, the phoenix will die.

But don't worry, the phoenix is able to rise from the ashes, recharged and ready to continue its quest. Players will need to collect hearts of birds along the way to make their phoenix stronger, and increase their chances of success.

With stunning stylized game with a retro feel, Rise from Ashes: A Phoenix's Quest is a game that is sure to keep players engaged and entertained. Are you ready to take on the challenge and help the phoenix break free from captivity?

Controls: 

WSAD/Arrows - Movement

X/K - Attack
